website_summaries.verdict: Many satisfied customers switch to the Quiet Panda after trying other anti-snoring masks first. Double strapping improves the fit significantly.
pros: 1-size fits all, with numerous hook and loop closure adjustments
Easy to put on and adjust
Few reports of uncomfortable heat retention
cons: Needs to air out before first use
Straps can leave marks on skin

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't work for my husband, but seller is great to work with!!!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I have to change my review. I was able to contact the seller, and the customer service was beyond stellar. The product was not a solution for my husband, but I would happily buy from this seller again. Did not work at all for my husband. He still snored like a lumberjack. The only thing that changed was that he snored and looked like a moron while he wore it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin J.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Awesome seller. We had some problems with the velcro coming apart during the night. We left an unsatisfactory review earlier. I'm writing now to say this is a good product made by a very awesome seller. The seller immediately responded and sent us a replacement. The binding on the edges and the velcro seemed to be redesigned resulting in no more popped fasteners in the night. And, the new model is much more comfortable to wear. Thoughtful touches include a sweat band if one is prone to that. This seller makes a great product. They are gracious and quick to respond to problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: VRP

customer_reviews.title: Decreased my snoring
customer_reviews.text: Decreased my snoring noticeably. It took me awhile to get it adjusted for comfort but now I can sleep through without waking up. It doesn't work as well as my anti-snoring mouthpiece, but is way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: wt47

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, I got it mainly to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, I got it mainly to be able to wear cpap dreamwear nasal pillow, wearing it keeps it from sliding around and falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Medicsr

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: I have only had one other chin strap with which to compare it. I did not like how that 1st strap fit near my ears, and the materials did not hold up well--though it did the job of keeping my mouth closed with a CPAP machine. This strap is much, much more comfortable to wear. The materials seem much more durable. Even the velcro seems to be made better; I'll be interested to see how well it continues to do, but I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SStephens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! This chin strap truly works the wonder to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! This chin strap truly works the wonder to help my snoring and sleeping with an open mouth! It's super helpful to prevent dry mouth. It did take me a couple of nights to get used to it since I toss a lot. And I do think their double velcro is much better than other single velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shin

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim, for my husband,hoping I could sleep better. I was pleased with the results, my husband mentioned the chin strap was soft and comfortable to sleep in. It didn’t complefely stop his snoring, however it isn’t as loud and has helped ALOT!
customer_reviews.author: HLeyva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable soft material, sturdy velcro, and stays on my chin even with my beard! Seeing instant results with my CPAP Nasal Pillows. Used this to solve the mouth leak. The other options irritated my fave too much to sleep and it was difficult to seal with all my facial hair. Will buy again when I need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT and much needed product
customer_reviews.text: GREAT and much needed product. My husband wears it, but says he wishes the velcro reached a little further to tighten it more. However, it really helps a lot. THanks!
customer_reviews.author: Trenee' Zweigle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t adjust small enough
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could return it. It never fit. Unable to adjust to the proper size to fit. I wish I could return it but was out of town for work and missed the deadline. I wouldn’t recommend buying this product if u have a small head, because it won’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No. Just no.
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this i cant see this working for anybody. Buy nasal diolators instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to Big
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst chin strap I’ve ever used. I use it to keep my mouth closed at night with my nasal cpap mask. Unless your head is the size of the great pumpkin, it will not work. It’s absolute trash. After two months, I had to pitch it and replace.
customer_reviews.author: uuuuuuuuu

customer_reviews.title: the smell was bad just like others
customer_reviews.text: Tried this one, the smell was bad just like others... had to return this one as well...
customer_reviews.author: Neant

customer_reviews.title: Too large, slips off
customer_reviews.text: This strap was too big for me. They need to offer different sizes. The cut outs for my ears are nearer to the top of my head, so the whole thing easily slips off while I'm sleeping. Also, the velcro straps are much too long. Update... this company has amazing customer service. THEY contacted ME to give me a full refund after seeing in my review that I wasn't satisfied with the product. A+ ! The only reason I leave 4 stars is because it did not fit, but I would do business with this company again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful design. Didn’t fit, stretched out, then Velcro died
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at first, (although it didn’t fit my head quite right.) but then I guess my head stretched it out and it seemed to lose some of its elasticity. I keep making it tighter and tighter but that’s making the fit worse. Woke up several times last night with my CPap air coming out my mouth. Too late to return it. :( Update: 4 months after I bought it, the Velcro was ripped out. How crappy does Velcro have to be to fall out? Def not worth the price. Spend a little more and get something that will last (and fit right.)
customer_reviews.author: I am Me

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Way too big. Totally useless. I'm a big guy with a large head. This doesn't do anything useful
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Does not last, velcro disintegrates
customer_reviews.text: I used this chin strap for a bout 3 months. The tension started to loosen. I adjusted the strap by pulling apart the velcro then reconnecting it. Over time it kept happening. The worst part - the individual velcro pieces started to come lose when I pulled it apart to change the tension. Those velcro pieces imbedded in my skin and bed sheets. They were very difficult to get off my skin. I have never seen velcro come apart like that. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay R. Biles

customer_reviews.title: Now a believer
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this order was fulfilled quickly and correctly, so I am appreciative of that. I tried on the chin strap and my spouse was thinking it was going to be uncomfortable and keep me awake, but it worked well. I did wake up a couple of times, but I don't believe it was due to discomfort. I asked my spouse the next morning if I had snored and the answer was no! I wore it again last night and slept through the night. It seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: bbk3e

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could try it but the ear opening ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could try it but the ear opening would either cut into the back of my ear or stay over my ear. Not sure what kind of head they used to design this but did not fit mine.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be working to keep my mouth closed and preventing CPAP mask leaks.
customer_reviews.author: HSV golfer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit as shown, slips off very easily
customer_reviews.text: See how it fits in the picture? Doesn’t fit like that. At all. It actually covers my ears. And if you have hair, it will slip off. Just one move of the head and it’s off. Experimented with every possible combination of the two Velcro closures. BTW, I am a male and wear a 7-5/8 baseball hat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for me
customer_reviews.text: I was still snoring at night when using this product. I was hoping it would work out. It was also a little uncomfortable, but I think it was just from not being able to breathe through my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Coolrelaxed

customer_reviews.title: really big
customer_reviews.text: I have a head that's so big that the "one size fits all" hats and even xl hats don't fit me and yet this thing was a little too big for me. Also i wasn't a fan of how big the lower strap is. felt like it was pressing on my jugular.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: These things suck. First of all they are too large for most faces. Secondly, they are extremely uncomfortable. And lastly they are cheaply constructed. Not to mention they don't seem to work. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this with and without my current mouth guard and it made no difference at all with my snoring. And a side note for guys with longer beards, this thing will be highly uncomfortable and have trouble staying in place. I'll stick to my mouth guard and skip this contraption.
customer_reviews.author: thunderpudd

customer_reviews.title: waaaaay too big
customer_reviews.text: it would be ideal if it was not way too huge for my normal sized grown man head, which is larger than average if anything. there is not enough material to wrap it tight enough to hold as it should. returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Not comfortable for all night wear. If you're snoring this is not the answer.
customer_reviews.author: big foot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The ear openings don't align very well and it does not support the chin securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well, Shut My Mouth
customer_reviews.text: My CPAP machine has probably added years to my life. But I'm hindered by my inability to keep my mouth shut (just ask my wife), while sleeping. That's vital for an effective CPAP experience. I've tried a variety of chin straps---all have failed to comfortably do the job. If they work, I always woke up with a sore jaw. Then I ordered LoveNation's Anti-Snoring Chin Strap. It fits snugly and, best of all, remains comfortably in place the entire night. Since my purchase, the number of hours of uninterrupted sleep has increased dramatically. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Do The Trick For Me
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this chin strap didn't help me. I had high hopes, and I positioned it correctly. I used my snore-tracking app to verify the results, but unfortunately my snore score increased! After listing to it this morning, I verified that my snoring continued last night. I feel so down because I really hoped it would help. I don't know what to try next, but I'll keep exploring. On the positive side, the strap was very comfortable. I had no problem in getting it to fit snugly, and I could feel the slight pressure keeping my mouth closed, so I simply don't understand why it didn't work. Oh well, I'll try something else!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: does not work as claimed
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all and was hard to put on and hurt my ears. Did not do what it claimed
customer_reviews.author: msmagnolia

customer_reviews.title: Anti Snoring Chin Strap
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable to wear. It fits well and adjusts to my head. I recommend this one over all the others.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: For years my wife (and kids in the next room) have been complaining about how loudly I snore - of course, I'm not bothered by it, but then again, I'm asleep and they're not. I've tried a number of different over-the-counter remedies, like the adhesive nose strips, which were not terribly effective for me, and left marks on my face. Thanks to this chin strap, peace has been restored and I'm greeted by happy, rested faces in the morning instead of bleary I-told-you-you-were-snoring looks. When I first started wearing it, the chin strap was a little warm and took some getting used to, but the results have been more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction guaranteed. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: The strap didn’t fit well and was very uncomfortable. I purchased two straps, returned both and had to pay a return shipping charge on each strap because they arrived in separate boxes! That’s not right. No satisfaction on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Don’t rush to purchase, however, is of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable device, especially if you have facial hair. It is fairly straight forward and easy enough to use, but for me, that’s where it ends. Not only do I snore, I also have significant TMJ issues, to which this was definitely no help. In fact, this exacerbated my condition. I personally found it uncomfortable and it impeded my ability to breathe normally. I was quite hopeful, but like many other anti snoring solutions, it was inadequate for me. Perhaps if you do not have significant TMJ or facial hair this might work better for you. The overall construction is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my snoring quieter
customer_reviews.text: I'll first say that I had very little confidence that this would help my snoring before I tried it. I'm happily surprised to say that while it does not stop me from snoring at all it does make it quieter. I think what it is doing is keeping my mouth closed so I am not snoring super loud through my mouth, but I do still snore through my nose. While this is not perfect, it is still good because my nose snoring is much quieter. My girlfriend is very pleased with it, and that's what really matters. It is comfortable to wear too, so that makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Relaxes My Jaw - Stops Clenching & Grinding
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It popped up when I searched for something else, and I wondered if it might keep me from clenching and grinding my teeth. It does! It sort of pulls my jaw back and up and holds it in a steady position, which relaxes it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in California

customer_reviews.title: Rest Matters!
customer_reviews.text: Got this device two weeks ago and haven't snored since. My spouse was very concerned that I had sleep apnea. So far no scary episodes to alarm him. I was afraid the device would aggravate my history of TMJ pain. I wear the device loosely and so far I have an excellent result. If I continue with my successful outcome, I'll be sure to get another.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable and did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. It was uncomfortable and I stilled snored. I recorded my sleeping on the Snore Lab app and it indicated that I did not have a reduction in snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fanning

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: The strap does not fit well. It cannot be tightened enough to keep my jaw closed. It has played a minor role in reducing my snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Velcro strip too short
customer_reviews.text: I received my strap today and I think it would work if it would fit. The Velcro strip isn't long enough to tighten it so my mouth can still easily open. It would probably work for someone who has a big head but I don't know why they didn't make it more adjustable. The strap in the back doesn't fit at all and makes it very uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: M&m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've use this strap every night and it is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rich Scudder

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad snoring issue
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived and I wasn't really sure what to expect. I've tried pretty much every product out there without much relief (or I suppose my wife's relief). It arrived and it's really just a piece of stretchy fabric with some holes and Velcro. The idea behind it makes sense as if it's placed correctly, it will force your jaw up and hopefully alleviate the snoring. Unfortunately this ended up being more of the same, but I didn't want to give it a bad rating as I'm sure this will work for some people. Thanks for trying.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Effective and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a snoring problem, especially since I got braces and it got worse. I've tried other products, but they don't work very well. So I'm going to give this anti-snoring chin strap a chance because its product picture appeals to me. I couldn't wait to use it the first night I received it, and I felt comfortable wearing it without feeling too compressed. And the way to put it on is very simple. The next morning, my boyfriend told me that my snoring last night was much less than usual, and I'm glad this is working. I'll continue to wear it to sleep from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Ma

customer_reviews.title: well made product
customer_reviews.text: This is soft and comfortable. Unfortunately, I have a very small head and nothing is ever small enough. I asked a local seamstress to make it smaller, and am awaiting the results. I did wear it for two nights and except for the size, it was wonderful. My Cpap mask fits over it with no problem. Cant wait to get it back and start a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it keeps my mouth shut during sleep. Has saved me down time for fatigue. My spouse likes it to as my open mouth snoring has ceased. The straps for your ears are awful little if any way to tighten. The area where your chin is secured is lightly rough like sand paper. The worst issue is I cant seem to get my mother in law to wear it when she visits!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Thumb

customer_reviews.title: Too weak, too loose, can't use.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but does not have the strength to do the job. I have tried many chin straps. Very hard for me to find one that can keep my lower jaw from opening during my sleep. The one that works for me is the CareFusion. The CareFusion strap goes on tight and more importantly, it stays tight all night. Sorry Panda, it just did not work.
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable at first, but it works
customer_reviews.text: "I was uncomfortable at first in it, but I think it was because I was sick. I found out I am definitely a mouth breather and thought I was choking. Last night I tried it again after getting over being sick and fitted it a little looser and I was fine. I do sweat a little bit in it and it moved over my ears, but I think it worked otherwise. I didn't have a dry throat this morning."
customer_reviews.author: Robin Haase

customer_reviews.title: Great chin strap, but it is coming apart.
customer_reviews.text: Great chin strap, but it is coming apart, and I have only had it since 10/21/18. But having said that, i will be ordering another one because it works better than any other chin strap with my CPAP. Please guys, work on the web under the ears, then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K-man

customer_reviews.title: It also allowed him to sleep more comfortably and wake up well rested
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and it helped quiet him. It also allowed him to sleep more comfortably and wake up well rested. I can sleep more through the night as well. Comfortable and easy to put on and it isn’t as restrictive as it may appear. I would recommended this to others!
customer_reviews.author: NikonSniper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I tried this and was told that within minutes of falling asleep that I was snoring. I was hoping it worked for me but it didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: david a constable

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! No more embarrassing nights at sleepovers with friends. It’s a little smelly at first but I soaked it for 2 days and the smell went away. It got a little sweaty so you might want to wash it a couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Close but no cigar
customer_reviews.text: This chin strap is fairly well desiged but has a major flaw. You'll notice that there are 2 individual velcro closures. One for the top of the head the other for behind the head. One is well made the other is, however, much too narrow. the velcro cannot hold up, falls apart of being worn a few times. If this flaw were corrected it would probably be a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: didn't help me.
customer_reviews.text: The strap was very big for my head and I had to really wrap it around in a strange way to get it to work. It would come loose in the middle of the night. Either I would take it off or it would come loose on it's own. I did better with the thing you put in your mouth, from an other place. But even that was strange. I feel there is no hope for my snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Rock Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fits and works
customer_reviews.text: Using this in conjunction with my CPAP. Bought it to replace the typical elastic strap which stretches and wears out over time, needing regular replacement. Hoping this will last longer. Takes a bit to get the fit right but it does fit and keeps jaw closed.
customer_reviews.author: IronRod

customer_reviews.title: Well made item
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 2 for comfort only because I have facial hair and it is not comfortable to wear for me, aside from that it is a very well made product and would last someone a long time. For someone without facial hair I would think comfort would not be an issue, I wish it weren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: CMills

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is as comfortable as this sort of thing can be
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is as comfortable as this sort of thing can be, not disturbing my sleep. As effective as it probably can be, because my wife says I still make noise but it is different and not as much as when my mouth drops open.
customer_reviews.author: bbran

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This chinstrap works exactly as stated, and so far has been perfect for keeping my mouth closed comfortably while wearing my C-Pap nose pillows. It may take a minute to adjust it correctly the first time, but once you have it settled it fits perfectly. Previous straps I've used were the same material but not double strapped, which caused the strap to push on my ears uncomfortably. My only complaint is the price. This material lasts long and is comfortable on my beard, but not enough to justify the cost. Then again, I'm kind of a cheapo dude, so take that as you will.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bagodonuts

customer_reviews.title: STRETCHES to fast, thin material, shreds
customer_reviews.text: It stretches too fast, meaning it's thin material and won't hold it's original size very long. Body temp seems to make it lose its functionality and as you adjust it to stay tight, it becomes unusable unless you use it as a slingshot for squirrels. I had a few of these for lack of choice. Finally, Amazon started carrying others.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Knox

customer_reviews.title: really works!
customer_reviews.text: Wifey NO LONGER keeps me awake! No uncomfortable or noisy hoses or machines, this simple thing works, for less than 20 willing to pay that ! Saw it advertised on an info-mercial for over a hundred. I was willing to pay that, but checked Amazon first, glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: john rice

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, but frankly, to really know its effectiveness, one should use it in a sleep study or monitor with an oxygen saturation monitor. However, I can say, for me, it is better than a CPAP or a mouth prosthesis. CPAP is noisy and cumbersome. Month prosthesis is uncomfortable. At least these are for me.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Tension
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine line between the proper amount of tension to keep jaw shut and a headache. Once I hit the sweet spot it works, but can't use on nights when my nose is plugged up. :)
customer_reviews.author: Love My Pittie

customer_reviews.title: Yay !!!
customer_reviews.text: Yay !!! finally something to help me sleep without my moth open at night. I have used a mouth piece that helps to keep my chin from falling back and it is okay but not that comfortable and my mouth would still open and I would wake up with a dry mouth. I thought I would try this and I love it, It is comfortable, the Velcro allows me to adjust the straps for comfort and I have not had to wear the mouthpiece or wake up with dry mouth. Thank you.....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mcalley

customer_reviews.title: Helps Minimizing Mouth Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I use a cpap machine with nasal pillows, not a full mask. Mouth leaks are common when using nasal pillows so to prevent that I bought this chin strap, which works fairly well. The only drawbacks for me is the strap is quite warm on my face, and my ears do not line up with the openings on the sides of the strap. Otherwise, it is well made with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This strap works
customer_reviews.text: This strap fits comfortably and decreased my snoring. The only thing I have to be careful about is getting my hair in the Velcro. The first time I used it my hair got caught in it and it was pretty painful. The strap does Work for me though which I’m happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work. In theory, it's made to keep your mouth closed, which is what I want. It does for the first hour or two. It then stretches, allowing the chin to drop. It's also very hot. I can't sleep when hot. I've adjusted straps as tight as possible but still allows chin to drop and mouth to open. Maybe if material was lighter weight, or has ventilation, it could work. Ear openings need to be deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for this purchase was to keep my mouth closed at night so I wouldn't get cotton dry mouth overnight. I live alone & don't know for sure if I snore but there have been times I awaken myself with a snort. I am having an issue with bursitis in my left hip which keeps me from sleeping on my side which I prefer. The strap is perfect for my needs. It's comfortable and I'm sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tousey

customer_reviews.title: Can’t accuse my wife of running the ceiling vacuum cleaner at night,anymore!
customer_reviews.text: This is a purchase for my sleeping partner. I received immediate relief from her loud , jarring snoring. I thought the device looked oppressive but she was willing to try it. Together with an electronic device we obtained separately this is a SOLUTION. We both sleep better and though the snoring hasn’t stopped, it is much more quiet. Hooray! This is an inexpensive way to help reduce the loudness of the snore. I am resting more peacefully and my wife seems to sleep better as well.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Before you go to bed. Just put it cover all round the head. Snores will disappear and bring you a prefect sleep .and you will get a nice sleep and feel good after you wake up. It keeps you quietly sleep . Because sometime someone can’t get quiet sleep. So this staff can help you. Highly recommended it and must buy
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: KINDA HELP
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and hope i could sleep better, after a few days tried, my husband said it's comfortable and durable, but need to take time to get use of it. I can't say it's really useful to prevent the snoring, but kinda help. Will see after more days coming.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Strap works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I couldn’t tie the strap well for the first few nights. Although I like the material but it’s just not very comfortable. But my wife told me I’m not as loud as before. So I try to adjust the strap one night and finally lock it into a comfortable spot. What I did is to tie both top and back Velcro and pull the top one backwards and then adjust the back Velcro to lock. It could be different for others, it does take some trial and error. The instructions provided on the packaging is fine, but still you need to find the best spot to enjoy it most.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Chin strap
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit uncomfortable to me not sure if it works for snoring I sleep alone but think it's helping with my sinus issues not waking up with dry mouth anymore think I will continue to use
customer_reviews.author: creecree

customer_reviews.title: Too Small to wear as instructed
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my CPAP to stop air leakage from my mouth. It is to small to wear as pictured, so I reversed it. It still does not effectively hold my jaw closed to aire is forced threw lips. The sound of lips flapping woke me one night from the sound. It seems to me it is made in China for smaller head than that of European/American.
customer_reviews.author: Nick A.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect solution!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend likes it, and I like it more. This chin strap is a problem solver. I was hoping Breathe Right type of snoring product could work for me, because they're small and light. But unfortunately, they didn't. My concern with a strap was it might be uncomfortable. But I'm so glad I didn't give up after the first few nights. I finally got a perfect position, now the strap is my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirezeric21

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, very comfortable, and no more snoring
customer_reviews.text: The device itself is thick and soft, can you can tell how stretchy it is. Because of its stretchy and soft nature, it fits perfectly on my face, and causes no discomfort when sleeping. My sleep tracker shows that I make very low snoring noise now, or maybe that’s just loud breathing. It’s been almost a week and I’ve been using it every night. So far so good. If it stops working, I’ll let y’all know.
customer_reviews.author: hy

customer_reviews.title: Best chin strap I've ever had !
customer_reviews.text: I have used both new and the older version and I can say they are the best chin straps i've ever had. Being a cpap user it was important the strap works and not get in the way of my cpap gear. The new version is lighter and more comfortable and best of all works! Plus outstanding customer service. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: tim estrada

customer_reviews.title: it really works!
customer_reviews.text: This strap really works. My husband snoring was severe but I can sleep well now after he wear this amazing item.the material is soft feeling,It shouldn’t bother him while he sleep. I Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Keeps my mouth shut do cpap Machine works properly.
customer_reviews.text: Like this even better than my previous chin strap. Hopefully the binding on the edges will prevent the de-lamination from washing
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy, please!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an adjunct to my cpap mask as my mouth would fall open in my sleep, negating effects of cpap. After a couple nights of use, the Velcro attachment piece became partially entangled with my hair. My hair would not yield to un-entanglement and I had to cut my hair free at that spot to get the strap off my head! There was no other way, the Velcro was so tightly meshed with my hair. I threw the strap out and am looking for an alternative device without the potential to damage my head and hair. Please beware!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Casey

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't fit like the picture, and it only reduces my snoring does not eliminate my snoring, i move around a lot in my sleep and sometimes it comes off.
customer_reviews.author: Bells

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out fast
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about three nights but then it got very loose and doesn't do the job anymore. It's good in theory but overall not helpful
customer_reviews.author: Elysia

customer_reviews.title: Cpap scores improved drastically!
customer_reviews.text: I received this three days ago and My husband uses it with his cpap nasal pillows over top of it. His cpap scores are much improved! His leaks and liters of air are way down! His cpap scores are way up around 98, he even got a 100 score last night! His events per hour are the lowest they have ever been, only 1.8 events per hour last night! He is more rested and very happy with the chin strap!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Winder

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a chin strap that would keep my mount closed while sleeping, to stop waking up with mouth and throat dry. I had to pull it so tight that the material tore at the holes for ears. I really liked at first, but after using a couple weeks, it no longer did the job.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but the sizing a little misleading. Says one size fits all but its actually a little big and have a hard time getting it tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart too quickly to be useful
customer_reviews.text: My husband was using this to help keep his mouth closed so his CPAP would work correctly, and it was able to do the job nicely. He didn't find it too uncomfortable, though it did get scratchy the one day he forgot to shave. The biggest problem is, the material it is made out of looses the stretch after a week or so. Now where the holes for airflow meet the outside seam, it is starting to tear in between. Since it is also not stretching like it was, my husband has to tighten it every couple of nights just to help it keep his mouth closed, which just increases the amount it starts to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Rough velcro on top strap catches hair
customer_reviews.text: This is the first chin strap I've tried that didn't irritate my skin (although I lined the chin area with soft t shirt fabric for extra comfort)---- HOWEVER, the velcro on the top strap is positioned the wrong way. The rough velcro faces the head, and catches hair in it. It can take a lot of tugging to remove your hair from the velcro. The soft velcro should be in that location. I also had to use scissors to trim the material away from my ears so it didn't cover them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my fiancee. She had past couple years snoring problem. I didn't expect much from this device.. But after a few days, we both felt the effect.I would like to highlight the quality, elastic and pleasant material, well staying on the head during the night.Now her snoring sounds doesn't affect on my sleep anymore, we both waking up full of energy and I'm glad that for reasonable price problem has been solved.
customer_reviews.author: Jackins Heather

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to work but it didn't work for me. It is pretty nicely made. Looks like it will last a long time. It fit well - at least I think it fit well and it's adjustable on the top and back of your head.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: No more snoring from me!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like the strap and am sure I will get more comfortable wearing it. It does what it is supposed to do, so that is most important. I have a very small head so I had to be creative to get it to fit, but once I did....it stayed secure. The strap itself is a bit thicker/heavier than I thought it would be. I bought one for me and one for my sister. We are taking a cruise and sharing a room with a non snorer.....here is hoping we are all still friends at the end of the week!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Johnsoñ

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: This product is comfortable and works well. A+++++ The women's size even fit me even though I have a fairly large head. Very personable seller and excellent to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: My wife is happy
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely not a lighthearted decision to get this, I have tried several different "treatments " for snoring but none has worked as well as the chin strap. It isnt too uncomfortable actually and very easy to put on and adjust to your head. My wife says it works well and I'll take her word for it, haven't been hit with a pillow for snoring since I got the chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: caleb

customer_reviews.title: This is a good design
customer_reviews.text: Previous to buying this strap, I had gotten another one, which never stayed on. This chin strap stays in place for most of the night. It does what it's supposed to do, keeping my mouth shut while I am asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Was comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was comfortable. I don’t know if it really worked but it was so dramatic that my friend who I was sharing a hotel room with did not comment on my snoring as she could see I was doing the best I could to prevent.
customer_reviews.author: GBSKI

customer_reviews.title: Slightly uncomfortable at first but didn’t wake myself by snoring
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this product. I’ve been told I’m somewhat of a snorer. The first night I felt that it worked but woke up with a stiff neck. Second night I loosened the straps and woke up “stiff-free.” I definitely felt an improvement in my sleep pattern. I wore a night cap so my hair didn’t get pulled by Velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap works for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought two chin straps, one for me and one for my mom. Turned out it works great for both of us. We never thought closing the mouth is a such help to stop snoring. I was not sure what the mesh hole for, but after first night, my mom told me thankful to those mesh holes, she might sweat a lot otherwise. I didn’t have any problem with it myself, won’t say it’s extremely comfortable, but it’s quite effective in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This chin strap did not keep my mouth closed and did not keep me from snoring. What it did was pull my jaw backward and I woke up with a sore jaw. Went back to my old strap after 3 nights. Sorry but it didn't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not help me
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for 5 days. Had my roommate get up different hours to check on me and he said I was still snoring. Quit using it after day 5 because the under chin part rubbed a spot on my chin. The strap itself is well made, just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not so easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I struggled to put it on. The images make it appear like the logo should be on the top strap, not the strap that goes around the back of the head but I could not, as hard as I tried, get this thing to fit that way. I had to turn it so the logo went around the back. Otherwise, my ears did not line up with the holes and I couldn't get it tight enough. I don't know if mine is defective or what. However, it does seem comfortable once I got it on.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Solved my dry mouth problem!
customer_reviews.text: They can get a little warm however overall they solved my open mouth problem when using my nasal CPAP. I no longer wake up with a dry mouth in the middle of the night. Took some getting used to wearing it. But after 2 weeks of use I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Thebayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for me based on my snore app score . It really wasn’t uncomfortable until I woke up during the night then I just didn’t like how my jaw was positioned. I would have worked with it had it helped the snoring but it didn’t. Easy return though!
customer_reviews.author: Nytransp

product_meta.title: Anti Snoring Chin Strap - Most Effective Snoring Solution and Anti Snoring Devices - Snoring Chin Strap - Stop Snoring Sleep Aid for Men and Women [Upgraded Version]
feature_bullets: KEEPING AIRWAYS OPEN is an effective snoring solution that allows more oxygen into the lung therefore to instantly stop snoring, clenching, tooth grinding.
PREMIUM QUALITY strap, the anti snoring devices, made of the best neoprene non-itchy material and fully sanitized for ready-to-use
COMFORTABLE ONE SIZE FITS ALL tension strength is easily managed by either tightening or loosening the strap, a snoring solution that works great with CPAP mask.
NON INVASIVE SNORING SOLUTION and easy to use, simply tie the chin strap beneath your chin to keep your mouth closed during sleep.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
